reciepts.title: crab cakes baltimore-style
reciepts.author: Pierre Franey
reciepts.descriptiion: This is a meal with complex flavors and a variety of textures: velvety from the honey-roasted squash, tender and juicy from the tofu, with the occasional crunch from the sesame-seed garnish and a slight chew from the squash peel.
